DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct United States America ( USA ) . The aim trial examine bioequivalence Norditropin速 versus Genotropin速 healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Two Somatropin Products ( Norditropin速 Versus Genotropin速 ) Healthy Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.027.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Considered generally healthy upon completion medical history , physical examination , vital sign , screen laboratory result , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , judge Investigator ( trial physician ) The receipt investigational medicinal product within 1 month prior trial Current previous treatment growth hormone IGFI ( insulinlike growth factorI ) Female childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method ( adequate contraceptive measure require local law practice ) duration trial Known presence history malignancy Diabetes mellitus Use pharmacologic dos glucocorticoid Use anabolic steroid History drug alcohol abuse
